title: NetflixGPT
description: This project It allows users to sign up, log in, explore movie categories (Now Playing, Popular, Top Rated, Upcoming), and get AI-powered movie recommendations — all in a sleek Netflix-style UI.
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Redux-Toolkit | Tailwind-css

title: ZeeTube
description: This project ZeeTube allows you to explore videos, view details, check comments, and even enjoy a simulated live chat experience — all wrapped in a responsive UI.
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Redux-Toolkit | Tailwind-css

title: YourBuddy
description: This project It listens to your voice, sends the query to Gemini (gemini-2.5-flash), and speaks the response back using the browser’s Speech Recognition and Speech Synthesis APIs

title: Expense-Tracker
description: This project provides users with an easy way to manage their income and expenses. It displays financial data in tables and charts, allowing users to effectively monitor their finances.
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Nodejs | Express.js | MongoDB | Bootstarp

title: Fitness First - Gym website
description: It is Gym website where user can join to the membership and choose different type exercise from different types of exercise categories
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Redux | JSON server | API

title: FashionIcon - ZARA clone
description: An E-Commerce website where users can buy different products from different category like Men,Women,kids etc.
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | JSON server | Chakra UI | API

title: Savari - Uber Clone
description: Clone of Uber app.It is a platform where you can book the cab/ride from any location all over the world.
technologies: HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Nodejs | Express.js | MongoDB | Chakra UI

title: Shopping Zone - bloomingdales Clone
description: It is an e-commerce website to purchase clothing and fashion accessories for women, men kids.
